title: i cant get into league
body:
today iv been playing league fine like no problems and i started watching one of my replays, and as soon as i leave a box comes up saying that theres a connection problem but my internet is fine cause i can make this post.....
so i tried closing and re opening it and the same box keeps coming up
i just would like some help on what to do about this cause its annoying

replies.body:
Hey there,

What is the exact error message your receiving?

At what point during the play cycle are you receiving this error? (When attempting to login, etc)
